name: Tochtli
description:
A rabbit is seen hopping calmly through a pasture, suddenly his ears hear something, and his ears react instantly. He never heard anything like this and curiously search for the cause, but he did see anything. In a moment bunch of colored sparks appear in the air, not far from the rabbit, and, almost at the same time, a flying snake appears. Although fear came to the meeting, it was more surprising and amazing. His eyes shone at this being.

It's a local co-op game you can play with Tochtli and Quetzalcóatl. Go and see the adventure.
